mapper.insert: insert into chat (ch_num, ch_fromid, ch_toid, ch_content, ch_sendtime, ch_sellidx, ch_status) values(#{ch_num},#{ch_fromid}, #{ch_toid}, #{ch_content}, now(), #{ch_sellidx}, 0 )
mapper.select: select * from chat where (ch_fromid = #{ch_fromid} and ch_toid = #{ch_toid}) or (ch_fromid =#{ch_toid} and ch_toid = #{ch_fromid}) order by ch_num
select ui_ncname from userinfo where ui_ncname like '%' #{value} '%'
